sourcesContent:
// Most import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './Account.css' function Account() { const transactions = useSelector((state) => state.transactions) const users = useSelector((state) => state.users) const stocks = useSelector((state) => state.stocks) const [selectedUser, setSelectedUser] = React.useState(users[0].id) // Filter transactions for active tokens and consumed tokens const activeTokens = transactions.filter( (tx) => tx.userId === selectedUser && tx.type === 'Buy Token' && !tx.consumed ) const consumedTokens = transactions.filter( (tx) => tx.userId === selectedUser && tx.type === 'Buy Token' && tx.consumed ) return (

Admin Stock Purchase History

Admin Current Holdings

{Object.entries(stocks).map(([stock, tokens]) => ( ))}
Stock Tokens Held
{stock} {tokens}

Account Heading

Your random tagline here

Total Balance:{' '} {users.find((user) => user.id === selectedUser).balance}
Total Tokens:{' '} {JSON.stringify( users.find((user) => user.id === selectedUser).tokens )}
Transactions

Active Tokens

{activeTokens.map((tx, index) => ( ))}
User ID Type Stock Amount Timestamp
{tx.userId} {tx.type} {tx.stock} {tx.amount} {tx.timestamp}

Consumed Tokens

{consumedTokens.map((tx, index) => ( ))}
User ID Type Stock Amount Timestamp
{tx.userId} {tx.type} {tx.stock} {tx.amount} {tx.timestamp}
) } export default Account
